description:
This add-on allows to present in a message various information about a character.
		It also allows to customize the information reported on a character when using review cursor character navigation commands or multiple presses of the review character command.

translations.description:
Тази добавка позволява да се представи в съобщение различна информация за знак.
		Също така ви позволява да персонализирате информацията, докладвана за даден знак, когато използвате командите за навигация по знаци с курсора за преглед или многократно натискане на командата за преглед по знаци.

This add-on allows to present in a message various information about a character.
		It also allows to customize the information reported on a character when using review cursor character navigation commands or multiple presses of the review character command.

Mit dieser NVDA-Erweiterung können Sie in einer Nachricht verschiedene Informationen über ein bestimmtes Zeichen ermitteln.
		Sie ermöglicht auch die Anpassung der Informationen, die zu einem Zeichen mitgeteilt werden, wenn Befehle zur Navigation durch den Cursor oder das mehrfache Drücken des Befehls "Zeichen überprüfen" verwendet werden.

Este complemento permite presentar en un mensaje información diversa sobre un carácter.
		También permite personalizar la información anunciada sobre un carácter al usar las órdenes de navegación por caracteres del cursor de revisión o pulsar varias veces la orden de leer carácter.

Tämä lisäosa näyttää merkin tiedot selaustilassa.
		Sen avulla on myös mahdollista mukauttaa merkistä puhuttavaa tietoa liikuttaessa merkeittäin tarkastelukohdistinkomennoilla tai painettaessa useasti Lue tarkastelukohdistimen kohdalla oleva merkki -komentoa.

Cette extension permet de présenter dans un message diverses informations sur un caractère.
		Il permet également de personnaliser les informations annoncées sur un caractère lors de l'utilisation des commandes de navigation par caractère du curseur de revue ou d'appuis multiples sur la commande de caractère de revue.

This add-on allows to present in a message various information about a character.
		It also allows to customize the information reported on a character when using review cursor character navigation commands or multiple presses of the review character command.

Ovaj dodatak omogućuje prikazivanje u poruci različitih informacija o znaku.
		Također omogućuje prilagodbu informacija prijavljenih na znaku kada se koriste naredbe za navigaciju znakovima pokazivača pregleda ili više pritisaka naredbe znaka pregleda.

This add-on allows to present in a message various information about a character.
		It also allows to customize the information reported on a character when using review cursor character navigation commands or multiple presses of the review character command.

Esse complemento permite apresentar em uma mensagem várias informações sobre um caractere.
		Ele também permite personalizar as informações relatadas sobre um caractere ao usar os comandos de navegação de caractere do cursor de revisão ou pressionar várias vezes o comando de caractere de revisão.

Este extra permite apresentar numa mensagem várias informações sobre um caracter.
		Permite também personalizar a informação reportada sobre um caracter quando se utilizam comandos de navegação do caracter do cursor de revisão ou múltiplas pressões do comando do caracter de revisão.

This add-on allows to present in a message various information about a character.
		It also allows to customize the information reported on a character when using review cursor character navigation commands or multiple presses of the review character command.

Это дополнение позволяет отображать в сообщении различную информацию о символе.
		Оно также позволяет настраивать информацию, сообщаемую о символе, при использовании команд навигации по символам с помощью просмотрового курсора или многократного нажатия команды просмотра символов.

This add-on allows to present in a message various information about a character.
		It also allows to customize the information reported on a character when using review cursor character navigation commands or multiple presses of the review character command.

Bu eklenti, bir mesajda bir karakter hakkında çeşitli bilgiler sunulmasına imkan verir.
		Ayrıca, gözden geçirme imleci karakter gezinme komutlarını kullanırken veya karakteri gözden geçir komutuna birden çok basıldığında bir karakter hakkında bildirilen bilgileri özelleştirmeye olanak tanır.

This add-on allows to present in a message various information about a character.
		It also allows to customize the information reported on a character when using review cursor character navigation commands or multiple presses of the review character command.
